data.name: OK
data.value: No errors.

data.name: BadCommand
data.value: Tried to call a function on a data type that does not allow this type of functionality (ie calling Sound.Lock on a streaming sound).

data.name: ChannelAlloc
data.value: Error trying to allocate a channel.

data.name: ChannelStolen
data.value: The specified channel has been reused to play another sound.

data.name: Dma
data.value: DMA Failure. See debug output for more information.

data.name: DspConnection
data.value: DSP connection error. Connection possibly caused a cyclic dependency or connected DSPs with incompatible buffer counts.

data.name: DspDontProcess
data.value: DSP return code from a DSP process query callback.Tells mixer not to call the process callback and therefore not consume CPU. Use this to optimize the DSP graph.

data.name: DspFormat
data.value: DSP Format error. A DSP unit may have attempted to connect to this network with the wrong format, or a matrix may have been set with the wrong size if the target unit has a specified channel map.

data.name: DspInUse
data.value: DSP is already in the mixer's DSP network. It must be removed before being reinserted or released.

data.name: DspNotFound
data.value: DSP connection error. Couldn't find the DSP unit specified.

data.name: DspReserved
data.value: DSP operation error. Cannot perform operation on this DSP as it is reserved by the system.

data.name: DspSilence
data.value: DSP return code from a DSP process query callback. Tells mixer silence would be produced from read, so go idle and not consume CPU. Use this to optimize the DSP graph.

data.name: DspType
data.value: DSP operation cannot be performed on a DSP of this type.

data.name: FileBad
data.value: Error loading file.

data.name: FileCouldNotSeek
data.value: Couldn't perform seek operation. This is a limitation of the medium (ie netstreams) or the file format.

data.name: FileDiskEjected
data.value: Media was ejected while reading.

data.name: FileEof
data.value: End of file unexpectedly reached while trying to read essential data (truncated?).

data.name: FileEndOfData
data.value: End of current chunk reached while trying to read data.

data.name: FileNotfound
data.value: File not found.

data.name: Format
data.value: Unsupported file or audio format.

data.name: HeaderMismatch
data.value: There is a version mismatch between the FMOD header and either the FMOD Studio library or the FMOD Low Level library.

data.name: Http
data.value: A HTTP error occurred. This is a catch-all for HTTP errors not listed elsewhere.

data.name: HttpAccess
data.value: The specified resource requires authentication or is forbidden.

data.name: HttpProxyAuth
data.value: Proxy authentication is required to access the specified resource.

data.name: HttpServerError
data.value: A HTTP server error occurred.

data.name: HttpTimeout
data.value: The HTTP request timed out.

data.name: Initialization
data.value: FMOD was not initialized correctly to support this function.

data.name: Initialized
data.value: Cannot call this command after FmodSystem.Initialize.

data.name: Internal
data.value: An error occurred that wasn't supposed to. Contact support.

data.name: InvalidFloat
data.value: Value passed in was a NaN, infinite, or denormalized float.

data.name: InvalidHandle
data.value: An invalid object handle was used.

data.name: InvalidParam
data.value: An invalid parameter was passed to this function.

data.name: InvalidPosition
data.value: An invalid seek position was passed to this function.

data.name: InvalidSpeaker
data.value: An invalid speaker was passed to this function based on the current speaker mode.

data.name: InvalidSyncpoint
data.value: The syncpoint did not come from this sound handle.

data.name: InvalidThread
data.value: Tried to call a function on a thread that is not supported.

data.name: InvalidVector
data.value: The vectors passed in are not unit length, or perpendicular.

data.name: MaxAudible
data.value: Reached maximum audible playback count for this sound's soundgroup.

data.name: Memory
data.value: Not enough memory or resources.

data.name: MemoryCantPoint
data.value: Can't use Mode.OpenMemoryPoint on non PCM source data, or non mp3/xma/adpcm data if Mode.CreateCompressedSample was used.

data.name: Needs3D
data.value: Tried to call a command on a 2D sound when the command was meant for 3D sound.

data.name: NeedsHardware
data.value: Tried to use a feature that requires hardware support.

data.name: NetConnect
data.value: Couldn't connect to the specified host.

data.name: NetSocketError
data.value: A socket error occurred. This is a catch-all for socket-related errors not listed elsewhere.

data.name: NetUrl
data.value: The specified URL couldn't be resolved.

data.name: NetWouldBlock
data.value: Operation on a non-blocking socket could not complete immediately.

data.name: NotRead
data.value: Operation could not be performed because specified sound/DSP connection is not ready.

data.name: OutputAllocated
data.value: Error initializing output device, but more specifically, the output device is already in use and cannot be reused.

data.name: OutputCreateBuffer
data.value: Error creating hardware sound buffer.

data.name: OutputDriverCall
data.value: A call to a standard soundcard driver failed, which could possibly mean a bug in the driver or resources were missing or exhausted.

data.name: OutputFormat
data.value: Soundcard does not support the specified format.

data.name: OutputInit
data.value: Error initializing output device.

data.name: OutputNoDrivers
data.value: The output device has no drivers installed. If pre-init, OutputType.NoSound is selected as the output mode. If post-init, the function just fails.

data.name: Plugin
data.value: An unspecified error has been returned from a plugin.

data.name: PluginMissing
data.value: A requested output DSP unit type or codec was not available.

data.name: PluginResource
data.value: A resource that the plugin requires cannot be found. (ie the DLS file for MIDI playback)

data.name: PluginVersion
data.value: A plugin was built with an unsupported SDK version.

data.name: Record
data.value: An error occurred trying to initialize the recording device.

data.name: ReverbChannelgroup
data.value: Reverb properties cannot be set on this channel because a parent channelgroup owns the reverb connection.

data.name: ReverbInstance
data.value: Specified instance in ReverbProperties couldn't be set. Most likely because it is an invalid instance number or the reverb doesn't exist.

data.name: Subsounds
data.value: The error occurred because the sound referenced contains subsounds when it shouldn't have, or it doesn't contain subsounds when it should have. The operation may also not be able to be performed on a parent sound.

data.name: SubsoundAllocated
data.value: This subsound is already being used by another sound, you cannot have more than one parent to a sound. Null out the other parent's entry first.

data.name: SubsoundCantMove
data.value: Shared subsounds cannot be replaced or moved from their parent stream, such as when the parent stream is an FSB file.

data.name: TagNotFound
data.value: The specified tag could not be found or there are no tags.

data.name: TooManyChannels
data.value: The sound created exceeds the allowable input channel count. This can be increased using the "maxInputChannels" parameter in FmodSystem.SetSoftwareFormat.

data.name: Truncated
data.value: The retrieved string is too long to fit in the supplied buffer and has been truncated.

data.name: Unimplemented
data.value: Something in FMOD hasn't been implemented when it should be! contact support!

data.name: Uninitialized
data.value: This command failed because FmodSystem.Initialize or FmodSystem.SetDriver was not called.

data.name: Unsupported
data.value: A command issued was not supported by this object. Possibly a plugin without certain callbacks specified.

data.name: Version
data.value: The version number of this file format is not supported.

data.name: EventAlreadyLoaded
data.value: The specified bank has already been loaded.

data.name: EventLiveUpdateBusy
data.value: The live update connection failed due to the game already being connected.

data.name: EventLiveUpdateMismatch
data.value: The live update connection failed due to the game data being out of sync with the tool.

data.name: EventLiveUpdateTimeout
data.value: The live update connection timed out.

data.name: EventNotFound
data.value: The requested event, bus or vca could not be found.

data.name: StudioUninitialized
data.value: The Studio::System object is not yet initialized.

data.name: StudioNotLoaded
data.value: The specified resource is not loaded, so it can't be unloaded.

data.name: InvalidString
data.value: An invalid string was passed to this function.

data.name: AlreadyLocked
data.value: The specified resource is already locked.

data.name: NotLocked
data.value: The specified resource is not locked, so it can't be unlocked.

data.name: RecordDisconnected
data.value: The specified recording driver has been disconnected.

data.name: TooManySamples
data.value: The length provided exceed the allowable limit.

data.name: PolygonNotEnoughVertices
data.value: A minimim of 3 vertices are required to define a polygon. {0} provided.
